creditsExplainedPage.title: Credits Explained
creditsExplainedPage.subtitle: Everything you need to know about how credits work on Kortix

understandingCredits.title: Understanding Credits
understandingCredits.description: Credits serve as Kortix's universal currency for platform operations. Every action your AI agents perform—from analyzing data to generating code—consumes credits based on the task's complexity and the resources required.

howCreditsWork.title: How Credits Work
howCreditsWork.description: Credits are consumed based on the resources your AI agents use:

aiModelUsage.title: AI Model Usage
aiModelUsage.description: The primary driver of credit consumption
aiModelUsage.content: Different AI models have different costs based on their capabilities and token usage. Credits are consumed for input tokens (your prompts and context), output tokens (agent responses), and vary by model tier (Claude, GPT, etc.).

pricingModel.title: Pricing Model
pricingModel.content: We apply a 20% markup on all API and model costs to cover platform infrastructure, security, and ongoing development. This transparent pricing ensures you know exactly what you're paying for.

gettingMoreCredits.title: Getting More Credits
gettingMoreCredits.description: There are several ways to obtain credits in Kortix:

monthlySubscription.title: Monthly Subscription Credits
monthlySubscription.description: Included with your paid plan and renewed automatically each month. These are expiring credits.

topUpCredits.title: Top-Up Credits
topUpCredits.description: Purchase additional credits when you need them. These are non-expiring and available to premium members.

promotionalGrants.title: Promotional & Event Grants
promotionalGrants.description: Bonus credits from special events, promotions, or referrals. These are non-expiring.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.description: Credits returned due to technical issues or failed tasks. These are non-expiring.

typesOfCredits.title: Types of Credits
typesOfCredits.description: Kortix uses two types of credits to give you flexibility in how you manage your usage:

expiringCredits.title: Expiring Credits
expiringCredits.content: These credits are included with your paid subscription and are renewed automatically each month on your subscription date. They expire at the end of each billing cycle and are always consumed first before any non-expiring credits.

nonExpiringCredits.title: Non-Expiring Credits
nonExpiringCredits.content: These credits never expire and carry over month to month. They include top-up purchases, refunds, and promotional grants. Non-expiring credits are only used after your expiring credits have been depleted.

creditPriority.title: Credit Priority:
creditPriority.description: When you use Kortix, expiring credits are consumed first. Only after your expiring credits run out will non-expiring credits be used.

image.0: A majestic golden eagle soaring through misty mountain peaks at sunrise with dramatic lighting
image.1: Close-up portrait of a fashion model with avant-garde makeup, studio lighting, high contrast shadows
image.2: Cozy Scandinavian living room with natural wood furniture, indoor plants, and soft morning sunlight
image.3: Futuristic cyberpunk street market at night with neon signs, rain-slicked pavement, and holographic displays
image.4: Elegant product photography of luxury perfume bottle on marble surface with soft reflections
image.5: Whimsical floating islands connected by rope bridges in a pastel sky with dreamy clouds
image.6: Macro close-up of morning dew drops on vibrant flower petals with bokeh background
image.7: Modern workspace desk setup with laptop, coffee, notebook, and succulent plants from above
image.8: Mystical forest path with ancient trees, glowing fireflies, and ethereal light beams through fog
image.9: Architectural detail of contemporary glass building facade with geometric patterns and reflections
image.10: Vibrant street food vendor stall with colorful ingredients, steam rising, and warm lighting
image.11: Serene Japanese zen garden with raked sand, moss-covered stones, and cherry blossom petals
image.12: Dynamic action shot of athlete mid-jump against dramatic sunset sky, silhouette effect
image.13: Rustic farmhouse kitchen with copper pots, fresh herbs, wooden cutting boards, and natural textures
image.14: Abstract fluid art with swirling metallic gold, deep blue, and emerald green organic patterns
